title: Wild sea bass with new potatoes and a champagne sauce
description: Bring the fantastic flavours of the sea to your table with this luxurious recipe.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz medium new potatoes, scrubbed and quartered
175g/6oz smoked streaky bacon, chopped into lardons
700-900g/1lb 9oz-2 lb sea bass, descaled, pin bones removed and cut into 4 fillets
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper
